title: Air Now Forecast - Today's Forecast for Cities
Air Now Forecast-  Tomorrow's Forecast for Cities
USA Counties
USA National Park Service Lands
EPA Tribal Areas (4 of 4):  Alaska Native Allotments
EPA Tribal Areas (3 of 4):  Alaska Reservations
EPA Tribal Areas (2 of 4):  Alaska Native Villages
EPA Tribal Areas (1 of 4): Lower 48 States
Tomorrow's AQI Forecast

popupInfo.title: Tomorrow's AQI Forecast
popupInfo.description: AQI Category:  {expression/expr0}

expressionInfos.name: expr0
expressionInfos.title: AQI Category
expressionInfos.expression:
var AQI = $feature.gridcode

When (
    AQI == 1, "Good",
    AQI == 2, "Moderate",
    AQI == 3, "Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups",
    AQI == 4, "Unhealthy",
    AQI == 5, "Very Unhealthy",
    AQI == 6, "Hazardous",
    "Undefined"
    )

title: PM10 - 24hrs (Large Scale View) - TempMonitors

popupInfo.title: {SiteName}
popupInfo.description:
{AQSID} - {DataSource}
Plot Data

Data Updated: {LocalTimeString}

 Pollutant NowCast AQI Concentration
 PM10 {PM10_AQI} {PM10}{expression/expr3}

expressionInfos.name: expr2
expressionInfos.title: PM10 AQI Category
expressionInfos.expression:
Var AQI = $feature.PM10_AQI

When (
IsEmpty(AQI), '',
When (
AQI >=0 && AQI <=50, 'Good',
AQI >=51 && AQI <=100, 'Moderate',
AQI >=101 && AQI <=150, 'Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups',
AQI >=151 && AQI <=200, 'Unhealthy',
AQI >=201 && AQI <=300, 'Very Unhealthy',
AQI >=301 && AQI <=500, 'Hazardous',
'Undefined'))

expressionInfos.name: expr4
expressionInfos.title: Local Time at Monitor

expressionInfos.name: expr2
expressionInfos.title: Ozone AQI Category
expressionInfos.expression:
Var AQI = $feature.OZONE_AQI

When (
IsEmpty(AQI), '',
When (
AQI >=0 && AQI <=50, 'Good',
AQI >=51 && AQI <=100, 'Moderate',
AQI >=101 && AQI <=150, 'Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups',
AQI >=151 && AQI <=200, 'Unhealthy',
AQI >=201 && AQI <=300, 'Very Unhealthy',
AQI >=301, 'Hazardous', 'Undefined')
)
